summary.span: 表示 的 对象的集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of objects for a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 定义的架构, 并确定每个可包含的数据类型。 The defines the schema of a , and determines what kind of data each can contain. 可以 通过对象的属性访问。 You can access the through the property of the object. 使用和方法来插入和删除对象。 The uses the and methods to insert and delete objects. 使用属性可确定集合中有多少个对象。 Use the property to determine how many objects are in the collection. 使用方法验证集合中是否存在指定的索引或列名称。Use the method to verify whether a specified index or column name exists in the collection. ## Examples 下面的示例循环访问对象的集合, 并输出集合中每个列的各种属性。The following example iterates through a collection of objects and prints various properties of each column in the collection. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData DataColumnCollection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataColumnCollection Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData DataColumnCollection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataColumnCollection Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下, 新`string`列的为。By default, the for the new column is `string`. 如果`null`为名称传入了或空字符串 (""), 则将为列提供默认名称 ("Column1"、"Column2" 等)。If `null` or an empty string ("") is passed in for the name, a default name ("Column1", "Column2", and so on) is given to the column. 使用方法可确定集合中是否已存在具有建议名称的列。Use the method to determine whether a column with the proposed name already exists in the collection. 如果通过添加或删除列成功更改了集合, 则会发生该事件。If the collection is successfully changed by adding or removing columns, the event occurs. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个新 的并将其添加到的。The following example creates and adds a new to a of a . if the column can be removed.
if,
- The parameter is .
- The column does not belong to this collection.
- The column is part of a relationship.

returns.span: - 另一个列的表达式取决于该列。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法在`true`返回或`false`结果之前执行多个检查。 The method performs several checks before returning a `true` or `false` result. 这包括以下内容: 列是否存在、是否属于表, 或是是否包含在约束或关系中。This includes the following: whether the column exists, belongs to the table, or is involved in a constraint or relation. 在尝试从集合中移除任何列之前, 请使用方法。Use the method before you try to remove any column from a collection. 你还可以使用方法来确定特定列是否存在, 然后再尝试将其删除。You can also use the method to determine whether a particular column exists before you try to remove it. ## Examples 下面的示例首先使用方法来确定是否在集合中找到了特定列。The following example first uses the method to determine whether a particular column is found in the collection. 如果找到, 则该方法测试是否可以删除列。If found, the method tests whether the column can be removed. 如果是这样, 则将通过方法删除列。If so, the column is removed with the method. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData DataColumnCollection.CanRemove Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataColumnCollection.CanRemove Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData DataColumnCollection.CanRemove Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataColumnCollection.CanRemove Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在对列执行其他操作之前, 请使用方法来确认是否存在列。Use the method to confirm the existence of a column before you perform additional operations on the column. 当两个`false`或多个列的名称相同但命名空间不同时, 此方法将返回。The method returns `false` when two or more columns have the same name but different namespaces. 如果在将某一列的名称精确到一个列时存在任何歧义, 则调用不会成功。The call does not succeed if there is any ambiguity when matching a column name to exactly one column. ## Examples 下面的示例使用方法和方法来确定是否可以移除列。The following example uses the method and the method to determine whether the column can be removed. 如果是这样, 将删除该列。If so, the column is removed. remarks.format: ## Remarks 在搜索列名称时, 是有条件区分大小写的。 is conditionally case-sensitive when it searches for column names. 例如, 如果一个名为 "mydatacolumn", 另一个名为 "mydatacolumn", 则用于搜索其中一列的字符串将被视为区分大小写。For example, if one is named "mydatacolumn" and another is named "Mydatacolumn", a string used to search for one of the columns is regarded as case-sensitive. 但是, 如果 "mydatacolumn" 存在并且 "Mydatacolumn" 不是, 则搜索字符串将被视为不区分大小写。However, if "mydatacolumn" exists and "Mydatacolumn" does not, the search string is regarded as case-insensitive. ## Examples 下面的示例使用属性打印索引指定的对象的值。The following example uses the property to print the value of a object specified by index. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData DataColumnCollection.this1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataColumnCollection.this1 Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData DataColumnCollection.this1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataColumnCollection.this1 Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 从集合中移除具有指定名称的 对象。

span.span: Removes the object that has the specified name from the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果通过添加或删除列成功更改了集合, 则会发生该事件。If the collection is successfully changed by adding or removing columns, the event occurs. ## Examples 下面的示例首先使用方法来确定是否在集合中找到了特定列。The following example first uses the method to determine whether a particular column is found in the collection. 如果找到了该方法, 则该方法测试是否可以删除该列。If it is found, the method tests whether the column can be removed. 如果是这样, 则将通过方法删除列。If so, the column is removed with the method. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData DataColumnCollection.Remove1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataColumnCollection.Remove1 Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData DataColumnCollection.Remove1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataColumnCollection.Remove1 Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

exception.span: 该集合中没有具有指定名称的列。

span.span: The collection does not have a column with the specified name.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void RemoveAt(int32 index) cil managed

span.span: The index of the column to remove.

summary.span: 从集合中移除指定索引位置的列。

span.span: Removes the column at the specified index from the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果通过添加或删除列成功更改了集合, 则会发生该事件。If the collection is successfully changed by adding or removing columns, the event occurs. ## Examples 下面的示例首先使用方法来确定是否在集合中找到了特定列。The following example first uses the method to determine whether a particular column is found in the collection. 如果找到了该方法, 则该方法测试是否可以删除该列。If it is found, the method tests whether the column can be removed. 如果是这样, 则将通过方法删除列。If so, the column is removed with the method. [!code-vb[Classic WebData DataColumnCollection.RemoveAt Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataColumnCollection.RemoveAt Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

exception.span: 该集合在指定的索引位置没有列。

span.span: The collection does not have a column at the specified index.
